name: Space Panic Arena
description:
Fight to survive in extraterrestrial environments while scavenging weapons and ammo.Horde ModeDefeat waves of enemies to earn money in order to upgrade your weapons.Features:
  • Upgrade/Salvage weapons
  • Experience being other planets/moons including Low Gravity
  • Realistic weapon interaction
  • Scavenge weapons/ammo with procedural spawning
  • Ammo belt for storing ammo and grabbing magazines
  • Weapon holsters for storing weapons
  • Touch pad locomotion
  • Haptic feedback when touching interactable objects
  • High definition textures and graphics with the power of Unity 5
